software_engineer.title: Senior Software Engineer
software_engineer.description: We are looking for an experienced full-stack developer with strong React and Node.js skills to join our engineering team. The ideal candidate will have experience building scalable web applications and working in an agile environment.
software_engineer.experienceRequirements: Minimum 5 years of professional software development experience with at least 3 years working with React and Node.js.
software_engineer.educationRequirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent practical experience.

creative_recruiter.title: Creative Talent Recruiter
creative_recruiter.description: We're seeking a talented Creative Recruiter to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience in talent acquisition within the creative industry and a strong network of connections with creative professionals.
creative_recruiter.experienceRequirements: Minimum 3 years of experience in recruiting for creative roles such as designers, copywriters, and art directors.
creative_recruiter.educationRequirements: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business, or related field preferred.

senior_graphic_designer.title: Senior Graphic Designer
senior_graphic_designer.description: We are looking for a Senior Graphic Designer to create stunning visual concepts for our clients. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio demonstrating expertise in brand identity, typography, and digital design.
senior_graphic_designer.experienceRequirements: Minimum 5 years of experience in graphic design with demonstrated leadership on major projects.
senior_graphic_designer.educationRequirements: Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or related field.

project_manager.title: Project Manager
project_manager.description: We're looking for an experienced Project Manager to oversee creative projects from concept to completion. The ideal candidate will have strong organizational skills and experience managing creative teams.
project_manager.experienceRequirements: Minimum 4 years of experience managing projects, preferably in a creative agency environment.
project_manager.educationRequirements: Bachelor's degree in Business, Communications, or related field.
